title: Bears defense beats up on Redskins, Ranking the remaining unbeatens (Football 9/24)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough for reactions to the Bears victory over the Redskins on Monday Night Football (5:00). The guys discuss what this win signals for Chicago, faith (or lack thereof) in Mitch Trubisky, and when Dwayne Haskins will start for Washington. The SuperFriends then speculate the Panthers future at QB (29:00), give an update on Saquon Barkley's injury (33:30), and discuss which coaches could get fired this season (37:00). Finally, we rank the 8 remaining unbeaten teams in the NFL (47:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
